name: Contentful Webhook 検証 (Express)
description: Contentful の Webhook 署名検証

files.template: const express=require('express'); const crypto=require('crypto'); const app=express(); app.use(express.raw({type:'*/*'})); app.post('/cf', (req,res)=>{ const sig=req.headers['x-contentful-signature']; const h=crypto.createHmac('sha256', process.env.CF_SECRET).update(req.body).digest('hex'); res.status(sig===h?200:401).send('ok'); }); app.listen(3000);
